name: Zoomiez
description:
Weave through the dense city streets as Pogi the pug as his owner latches on to leash for dear life! The owner will grab on to anything to slow down Pogi but there's just no stopping him. Instead, we made a game out of it, and for each item the owner latches on to, we'll give you points! The bigger the item, the bigger the points!

Enjoy and leave the city in ruins as Pogi the adorable pug!

Controls:

  • Click and hold down the left mouse button to make Pogi follow your mouse pointer
  • Press the Escape key twice to quit the game

Special thanks to:

  • Synty Studios for the wonderful assets
  • polyperfect  for the equally wonderful assets
  • Archanor VFX for the epic particle effects
  • SI-PML for the cool BGM
  • Gamemaster Audio and Sidearm Studios for the loads of fun SFX
  • Unity for being a game engine
